mapper.select: SELECT B.IDX, B.MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'HH24:MI') WHEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') THEN TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'MM.DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(REGDATE, 'YY.MM.DD') END AS REGDATE, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, DELNUM, PARENT, M.MENU_NAME FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MENUS M ON B.MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID WHERE B.MENU_ID = #{menu_id} ORDER BY B.IDX DESC
SELECT IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, REGDATE, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, DELNUM, PARENT FROM BOARD WHERE IDX = #{ idx }

SELECT CIDX, IDX, CWRITER, COMMENT_TEXT, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(CINDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN TO_CHAR(CINDATE, 'HH24:MI') WHEN TO_CHAR(CINDATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') THEN TO_CHAR(CINDATE, 'MM.DD') ELSE TO_CHAR(CINDATE, 'YY.MM.DD') END AS CINDATE FROM COMMENTS WHERE IDX = #{ idx } ORDER BY CIDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( IDX, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONT, WRITER, READCOUNT, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, DELNUM, PARENT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(IDX), 0)+1 FROM BOARD), #{ menu_id }, #{ title }, #{ cont }, #{ writer }, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 )
INSERT INTO COMMENTS( CIDX, IDX, CWRITER, COMMENT_TEXT, CINDATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(CIDX), 0)+1 FROM COMMENTS), #{ idx }, #{ cwriter }, #{ comment_text }, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE COMMENTS WHERE IDX = #{ idx } AND CIDX = #{ cidx }
